Class DBUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aru.DBUtils

  • public class DBUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by avenkat Collections of utilities to read and write from and to the database.

      • writeToDB

        public static void writeToDB(java.lang.String follower,
             java.lang.String subject)
        Writes a relationship between a subject and a follower to the database.
        Parameters:
        follower - follower following given subject.
        subject - subject being followed.

      • getSubjectList

        Gets a list of subjects form the database
        Parameters:

      • queryFollowersForSubjectRecursive

        public static int queryFollowersForSubjectRecursive(java.lang.String rootSubject,
                                    java.lang.String subject,
                                    int startCount)
        Queries a subject recursively for followers. If a subject's followers have sub followers then they will be the subjects followers as well.
        Parameters:
        rootSubject - Root subject whose followers are calculated, to avoid endless loops
        subject - Subject whose followers are calculated, in case they are a sub part of the overall graph
        startCount - starting count of number of followers for subject
        Returns:
        Count of total recursive followers

      • addTOSubjectList

        private static void addTOSubjectList(java.util.List<java.lang.String> subjectList,
                    java.lang.String newSubject)
        Checks for presence of a subject and adds to a given subject list
        Parameters:
        subjectList - list of subjects to be added onto
        newSubject - name of subject to be added to list

        private static java.sql.PreparedStatement getPreparedStatement(java.lang.String selectStatement)

        Gets a prepared statement by getting a connection from shared connection pool.
        Parameters:
        selectStatement - Query statement to be used
        Returns:
